skill_e.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Basic attacks stun the target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target again for 5 seconds.

Activation: Increases Movement Speed by 15/20/25/30/35/40% and ignores unit collision for 2/2.25/2.5/2.75/3/3.25 seconds.

skill_i.tooltip: Entering a stance grants Udyr bonus Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short duration. This effect can stack multiple times.

skill_q.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after will perform a Tiger Strike, dealing bonus 30/60/90/120/150/180 (+[1.2, 1.3, 1.4, 1.5, 1.6]) physical damage over 2 seconds.

If a target is affected by Tiger Strike, a new application of Tiger Strike will deal the remaining damage instantly.

Activation: Increases Attack Speed by 30/40/50/60/70/80% for 5 seconds.

skill_r.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after burns enemies in front of him, dealing ? magic damage.

Activation: Unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing ? magic damage each second to nearby enemies for ? seconds.

skill_w.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after heals him for (+?) (2.5% of his maximum health), increasing by 1% for every percent of Udyr's missing health.

Activation: Gains a shield that absorbs 60/95/130/165/200/235 (+0.5) damage for 5 seconds.
